input.sentences: we visited my childhood home this weekend .
i 've always loved the view from the living room .
i 'm not sure there 's a book that my mom does n't own .
my dad insists that his old tv is all he needs .
i got a few emails check in mom 's office . she 's usually not very neat .
output.sentences: This weekend I went home and visited with my family.
I always loved the view from our living room so I spent a lot of time in there.
Mom showed off her new book shelf which was very charming indeed.
Dad knows how I feel about watching too much tv so it was off most of the time I was there and he insists he doesn't watch it much anymore.
Mom set up a neat little office for me to work in hoping I will stay longer.
